This is test page that has a secure form. It is part of a test to show that form state is restored during back/forward navigations.


Test Passed









Initial Value
foo
Value set by User that should be Restored
bar



============== Back Forward List ==============
        http://127.0.0.1:8000/navigation/restore-form-state-https.html
curr->  http://127.0.0.1:8000/navigation/resources/restore-form-state-https-1.html
        http://127.0.0.1:8000/navigation/resources/otherpage.html
===============================================
